In environment f : R -> R a, b, m : R H : forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> m <= f x n : a <> b Unable to unify "is_lb_Rbar ?M2563 (Glb_Rbar ?M2563) /\\ (forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar ?M2563 b -> Rbar_le b (Glb_Rbar ?M2563))" with "Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) = Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b)".

In environment H0 : forall E : R -> Prop, is_glb_Rbar E (Glb_Rbar E) r : R -> Rbar f : R -> R a, b, m : R n : a = b -> False H : Rmin a b < m -> m < Rmax a b -> m <= f m Unable to unify "match Inf_fct ?M2805 ?M2806 ?M2807 with | Finite x => match Finite (?M2805 ?M2808) with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Finite (?M2805 ?M2808) with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end" with "r (Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b)) = Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b)".

In environment H2 : forall E : R -> Prop, is_glb_Rbar E (Glb_Rbar E) r0, r : R -> Rbar f : R -> R a, b, m : R n : a = b -> False H : Rmin a b < m -> m < Rmax a b -> m <= f m H0 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b x : R), Rmin a b < x -> x < Rmax a b -> Rbar_le (Inf_fct f a b) (r0 (f x)) Unable to unify "m <= f m" with "r (Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b)) = Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b)".

original: intros. unfold is_finite, Inf_fct. destruct (Req_EM_T a b); intros. - subst. apply Finite. - apply Glb_Rbar_correct. intros y [x [H1 H2]]. specialize (H x). assert (Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) by lra. specialize (H H3). apply Rle_trans with (f x). + apply Inf_fct_le. auto. + apply H.
